text: John James Bell (born 2 March 1891) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Nottingham Forest, Rotherham County, Hartlepools United, South Shields and Grimsby Town. == Personal life == Bell served in the British Armed Forces during the First World War. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |FA Cup ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="3" |Plymouth Argyle |1912–13 | rowspan="2" |Southern League First Division |14 |7 |2 |1 |16 |8 |- |1913–14 |5 |1 |0 |0 |5 |1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !19 !8 !2 !1 !21 !9 |- | rowspan="3" |Nottingham Forest |1913–14 | rowspan="2" |Second Division |30 |4 |2 |1 |32 |5 |- |1914–15 |24 |2 |1 |0 |25 |2 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !54 !6 !3 !1 !57 !7 |- |Hartlepools United |1923–24 |Third Division North |12 |4 | colspan="2" |― |12 |4 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !85 !18 !5 !2 !90 !20 |} ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Sportspeople from South Shields Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:St Bartholomew's F.C. players Category:Bolton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Ashfield United F.C. players Category:Royal Engineers A.F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Jack Bell (footballer, born 1891)
